\n<Lieza>Matsuki!! Trying to get yourself "wrapped" up with an apprenticeship for the day?

\n<Lieza>Taking the time to talk to such an old soul? What a kind one you are! Your help this year has really helped the fields! Just look over at them, full of food and potential! I purposely tilled the right side of the fields, but left them unplanted. When you have time, spend the day with me! Ill bribe you with some seeds I have left over from my burial!
\n<Lieza>haha Im just joking!!! I ate those not long after rising! No no I have some saved from last spring I can give you!
\n<Jet>Are there really any fish in the pond up there? I can never reach it!!
\n<Sara>Yeah!! I asked about your special day and Shi-chan just said she likes older women!
\n<Sara>Matsu!!! Youre as red as Shi-chan!!! Are you sick too??
\n<Sara>I want pants with swords built in!! Those humans will quiver before me!!

\n<Sachi>Hello young Matsuki! Its almost time for your day of choosing and Im with Lieza now picking out offerings to the Gods. May they bless us with good harvests, successful hunts, and healthy children!
\n<Matsuki>(When will the lies end you unwholesome shrine maiden?)
\n<Sachi>Sometimes I get a bit hungry when laying out the offerings, but the Gods forgive the old.
\n<Misha>hm? Oh Im sorry Ive been looking over these reports for awhile, I didnt notice you walk in.
\n<Matsuki>Its alright dad, is your manuscript going well
\n<Misha>Its hard to tell, there is no precedent for it. I dont believe the Drakul or humans have ever gotten along..
\n<Matsuki>Well its a good thing our family is known for being stubborn then isnt it?
\n<Misha>Youre good at this Matsu, Im so proud.
\n<Misha>Now go out there and make me proud!
